HR, WORKPLACE the activity of asking someone questions to see whether they are suitable for a job or course: The person doing the interviewing is not the person the new employee will be working for. We have a fairly rigorous interviewing process. interviewing skills/techniques
MARKETING the activity of asking people questions to get their opinion about a product or service, so that it can be improved or better advertised: Our marketing assistant has done hours of interviewing.
COMMUNICATIONS the activity of asking people questions about themselves for newspaper articles, television shows, etc.: Readers seem to like her informal style of interviewing.
